properties.comment: Communication and Motives of Self-Governance Phase 2 Configuration
properties.entry:
Phase 2

Instructions for Round {self.roundIndexLabel}

The length of each of the following {self.repeat} rounds is {self.duration} seconds. As in the practice round you can collect green tokens. However, this time you will earn {dollarsPerToken} lab dollars for each token collected. You cannot reset the distribution of green tokens.

On the top right corner of the screen you can see how many tokens you have collected. On the top left corner of the screen you can see the amount of time remaining in the round.

If you have any questions please raise your hand.
